title: The entire FSI available under clause 5 shall be allowed to be utilised on plot/plots under redevelopment scheme
clause_text: The entire FSI available under clause 5 shall be allowed to be utilised on plot/plots under redevelopment scheme. However, if the owner/society so desire, they can avail the incentive FSI on the same plot or can avail the benefit of TDRs to be used in accordance with the Regulations no. 32.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order

source_pdf.text_snippet: The entire FSI available under clause 5 shall be allowed to be utilised on plot/plots under redevelopment scheme. However, if the owner/society so desire, they can avail the incentive FSI on the same
